mapper.select: SELECT B.id AS id, B.bus_number AS bus_number, B.cost AS cost, D.id AS driver_id, D.name AS driver_name, DL.id as driver_license_id, DL.number as driver_license_number FROM Buses B JOIN Persons D ON B.driver_id = D.id JOIN Driver_License DL ON D.driver_license_id = DL.id WHERE B.id = #{id}
